content: this easy summer fun market tote is great for going to the market the beach or just toting around on your other summer adventures > this pattern is available for **free** on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above materials 3 skeins of cotton yarn in blue i used lion brand kitchen cotton in tropic breeze affiliate link 1 skein of cotton yarn in green i used lily sugar n cream in hot green 1 skein of cotton yarn in white i used lion brand kitchen cotton in vanilla affiliate link size i crochet hook stitch marker tapestry needle scissors
